hero.title: A Shared Language for
hero.description: Building open source, community-led infrastructure for decentralized data management. Join us in creating the foundation for universal interoperability.

whatIsUOR.title: What is UOR?
whatIsUOR.description: Universal Open Research is an open-source framework for building interoperable, decentralized data systems.
whatIsUOR.content: UOR provides a common language and infrastructure for data exchange across different platforms, protocols, and applications. By establishing universal standards and open-source tools, we enable seamless interoperability without centralized control.

whyBuild.title: Why Build with UOR?
whyBuild.description: Powerful primitives for the next generation of data infrastructure.

serverless.title: Serverless Infrastructure
serverless.description: Deploy without managing servers. Scale automatically with demand.
serverless.content: Built on modern serverless architectures, UOR eliminates infrastructure complexity while maintaining high performance and reliability.

universal.title: Universal Language
universal.description: One protocol to rule them all. Interoperable by design.
universal.content: A shared semantic layer enables seamless communication between different systems, protocols, and data formats without custom integrations.

limitless.title: Limitless Applications
limitless.description: From AI to blockchain. Build anything, anywhere.
limitless.content: UOR adapts to your needs. Whether you're building AI models, blockchain applications, or traditional web services, UOR provides the foundation.

cta.title: Join the Community
cta.description: Connect with researchers, developers, and contributors building the future of decentralized data infrastructure.
